info.title: JEWebAPI
info.description: ASP.NET Core Web API for JurisEvolution

post.summary:
Returns a list of actors.
Having the offset at -1 will return the count.
Return a list of available filters for actors

get.summary: return a list classification definitions by class Id
return a list of classification items from classification definition Id

post.summary:
Returns a list of clients.
Having the offset at -1 will return the count.
Return a list of available filters for clients

Returns a list of corporationInfos.
Having the offset at -1 will return the count.
Return a list of available filters for corporationInfos

Returns a list of employees.
Having the offset at -1 will return the count.
Return a list of available filters for employees

get.summary: Returns a list of reference person roles.
Returns a list of intervenor roles.
Returns a list of relation roles.
Initialize a new matter of a specified type
Returns a list of matter types allowed for matter creation
Verify if can close a matter

post.summary:
Returns a list of suppliers.
Having the offset at -1 will return the count.
Return a list of available filters for suppliers

clientNumber.description: Client number to use for referencing the actor

idNumberDescriptor.description: Descriptor of the the IdNumber to use for referencing the actor

idNumberValue.description: Value of the the IdNumber to use for referencing the actor

JEWebAPI.Forms.ActorRefForm.description: Form to use for referencing an actor without knowing its Id

systemId.description: SystemId of the the ClassificationDef to use for referencing the ClassificationDef

name.description: Name of the the ClassificationDef to use for referencing the ClassificationDef (check in all language values)

JEWebAPI.Forms.ClassificationDefRefForm.description: Form to use for referencing a ClassificationDef without knowing its Id

systemId.description: SystemId of the the ClassificationItem to use for referencing the ClassificationItem

value.description: Value of the the ClassificationItem to use for referencing the ClassificationItem (check in all language values)

JEWebAPI.Forms.ClassificationItemRefForm.description: Form to use for referencing a ClassificationItem without knowing its Id

actorId.description: Id of the actor representing this intervenor

roleId.description: Id of the role of this intervenor (used for reference person only)

roles.description: roles of this intervenor (used for intervenor who arent reference person)

partieAdverse.description: Specify if this intervenor is of opposing party

referenceNumber.description: The reference number of this intervenor

isReferencePerson.description: specify if this intervenor is a reference person

actorId.description: Id of the actor representing this intervenor relation

relationId.description: Id of the relation to the intervenor

referenceNumber.description: The reference number of this intervenor relation

language.description: Language of the matter, represented by the two-letter form (ex: fr, en)

tarificationId.description: Id of the matter's pricing mode

tarificationRefValue.description: Reference value of the matter's pricing mode

fixedPrice.description: The amount of the fixed price if the matter's pricing mode is fixed price

infoBureauId.description: Id of the office of the matter

infoBureauIdentifier.description: Identifier of the office of the matter

items.$ref: #/components/schemas/System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2[[System.Int32, System.Private.CoreLib, Version=5.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e],[System.String, System.Private.CoreLib, Version=5.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e]]

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.BusinessFormMatterVie.description: Viewmodel of a business form matter, the typeSystemId value is 16, 17 or 19

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.BusinessLawMatterView.description: Viewmodel of a law matter, the typeSystemId value is 5

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.Models.CivilMatterVie.description: Viewmodel of a civil matter, the typeSystemId value is 1, 15 or 21

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.Models.ClientMatterVi.description: Viewmodel of a client matter, the typeSystemId value is 23

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.Models.CorporateBookM.description: Viewmodel of a corporate book matter, the typeSystemId value is 10

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.Models.CriminalMatter.description: Viewmodel of a criminal matter, the typeSystemId value is 3

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.Models.DevMatterViewM.description: Viewmodel of a dev matter, the typeSystemId value is 12

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.Models.EmployeeMatter.description: Viewmodel of a employee matter, the typeSystemId value is 18

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.Models.FamilyMatterVi.description: Viewmodel of a family matter, the typeSystemId value is 2

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.Models.LegalOpinionMa.description: Viewmodel of a legal opinion matter, the typeSystemId value is 7

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.Models.MatterManagerM.description: Viewmodel of a matter manager matter, the typeSystemId value is 11 or 20

typeSystemId.description: system Id of the matter type

peekedNumber.description: The preview number of the new matter

numberPrefixe.description: The prefix part of the matter's number

numberSequence.description: The sequence part of the matter's number

numberSuffixe.description: The suffix part of the matter's number

numberExpressionParts.description: All the parts used to construct the matter number

referencePersonsGroupedByActor.description: List of matter's reference persons (grouped by actor)

canEdit.description: Matter can be edited by current user

canDelete.description: Matter can be deleted by current user

canRead.description: Matter can be read by current user

containCourtNumber.description: The matter contains a court number

isSupplierType.description: The matter is of a supplier type

fixedPrice.description: If the matter's tarification is of a fixed price, this is its amount

convertToTypes.description: Available type that the matter can be converted

jurisMandatId.description: The matter's number if it was a JurisMandat form at one point

isFinancial.description: The matter is of a financial type

isFinancialTrust.description: The matter is of a financial trust type

idWithChilds.description: List of all matter ids linked to this matter

items.$ref: #/components/schemas/System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2[[System.Int32, System.Private.CoreLib, Version=5.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e],[System.String, System.Private.CoreLib, Version=5.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e]]

availableInfoBureaux.description: List of available offices to assign as the matter's office

matterAutomaticNumberChanged.description: Specify wether the matter's number no longer match the previewed matter number

parentMatterTypeSystemId.description: The matter's parent matter type system Id

parentIsAllowed.description: specify wether the current user has the rights to see the matter's parent

previousInstanceId.description: Id of the matter's previous instance

isAlreadyInstancied.description: specify wether the matter is already instancied

disableNumberValidation.description: specify wether the matter's court number validation is disabled or not

customMetaDataSections.description: The matter's custom meta data sections

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.Models.OtherMatterVie.description: Viewmodel of a matter of type "other", the typeSystemId value is 8

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.Models.SupplierMatter.description: Viewmodel of a supplier matter, the typeSystemId value is 14

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.Models.TAQMatterViewM.description: Viewmodel of a TAQ matter, the typeSystemId value is 13

length.description: Gets or sets the length of the whole collection.

collection.description: Gets or sets the collection or a portion of it.

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.VirtualCollectionView.description: Represents a collection or a part of it. So the client will know if it has the whole collection of a portion of it.

collection.description: Gets or sets the collection or a portion of it.

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.VirtualCollectionView.description: Represents a collection or a part of it. So the client will know if it has the whole collection of a portion of it.

length.description: Gets or sets the length of the whole collection.

collection.description: Gets or sets the collection or a portion of it.

JEWebAPI.ViewModel.VirtualCollectionView.description: Represents a collection or a part of it. So the client will know if it has the whole collection of a portion of it.
